meta.content: AMES is a public charter high school in Salt lake City that provides students with opportunities to extend their knowledge beyond the typical high school curriculum, especially in the areas of technology, math, science and engineering.
AMES | Academy for Math, Engineering & Science | SLC, Utah

AMES is a public charter high school in Salt lake City that provides students with opportunities to extend their knowledge beyond the typical high school curriculum, especially in the areas of technology, math, science and engineering.

span.span: An Early College High School - Established in 2003 - Partnered with the University of Utah

div.p: The Academy for Math, Engineering & Science is a public charter high school (9-12) that provides students with opportunities to extend their knowledge beyond the typical high school curriculum, especially in the areas of technology, math, science and engineering.

span.span: At AMES, we are looking for students who are:
